name: War Mother
aura: Increases Ally ACC in Faction Crypts by 65.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Cry Havoc

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places two [Bomb] debuffs that detonate after 2 turns. Bomb damage increases by 100% against Bosses.
skills.name: Special Brew

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Instantly detonates all [Bomb] debuffs if this Champion is under an [Increase ATK] buff.
